com.appscend.media.renderers

Interface IVeeplayRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KRAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExoPlayerRenderer, MediaPlayerRenderer

    public interface IVeeplayRenderer
extends KRAdapter
    Created by Andrei Marinescu on 26.03.2015. Interface used by Veeplay Renderer classes to communicate with the player and execute video rendering tasks
